q: Caravan. Chrysler Group Chief Executive Sergio Marchionne vowed to keep the automaker on top of the minivan segment in the North American market and said the company will develop a new type of minivan by 2014. We're not going to give one inch of territory in terms of our domination of( the minivan) segment, Sergio Marchionne said to workers at the Windsor Assembly Plant on Tuesday, where the Dodge Grand Caravan and the Chrysler Town& Country minivans are made. said David Letterman .`` Being pummeled?'' Anderson Cooper said.`` I don't recommend it. I'd never been hit in the head before.'' He described the scene, saying, People came from all around, surrounding us, punching us, kicking us, trying to rip the clothes off my female producer. It was weird. And we were lucky, frankly.... I would start to slap back and then realize this is going to make it worse. My adrenline was pumping so much. I've never really been in a fight like this or attacked by a mob like this. I thought I was saying calm down, as if they could understand what I was saying. According to the Morning News, Dwaine Caraway on Tuesday told Dallas sports radio station 1310 AM that he honored Michael Vick because he thinks the quarterback can be a role model for kids. These kids are the future, and we don't have enough folks out here joining hands and turning lives around, Dwaine Caraway said, according to the newspaper. Guantanamo Bay one of world's finest prisons: Donald Rumsfeld THE`` war on terror'' prison at the US naval base in Guantanamo Bay, Cuba is one of the finest prison systems in the world, former defence secretary Donald Rumsfeld has said. Donald Rumsfeld , who is promoting his autobiography Known and Unknown, praised US military personnel who worked at the site in the interview on Fox News Channel's Hannity show.
